text: Alexei Popyrin was the defending champion but chose not to defend his title. Zhang Zhizhen won the title after defeating Go Soeda 7–5, 2–6, 6–4 in the final. ==Seeds== All seeds receive a bye into the second round. ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ====Section 1==== ====Section 2==== ===Bottom half=== ====Section 3==== ====Section 4==== ==References== *Main Draw *Qualifying Draw Jinan International Open - Men's Singles 2019 Men's Singles
title: 2019 Jinan International Open – Men's Singles
